p: There is serological evidence of CDV infections in Namibian free ranging and captive cheetahs ( Acinonyx jubatus) [102], Namibian caracals ( Caracal caracal) [102], Argentinian Geoffroy's cats ( Leopardus geoffroyi) [111], Brazilian pumas ( Puma concolor) [112], and Californian mountain lions ( Puma concolor) [113].
